text: Jewel Thief – The Heist Begins is an 2025 Indian Hindi-language action thriller movie directed by Kookie Gulati and Robbie Garewal. Produced by Marflix Pictures, it stars Saif Ali Khan, Jaideep Ahlawat, Nikita Dutta and Kunal Kapoor. The movie was premiered on Netflix on 25 April 2025. == Cast == * Saif Ali Khan * Jaideep Ahlawat * Nikita Dutta * Kunal Kapoor == Production == === Development === The movie was announced in February 2024, starring Saif Ali Khan and Jaideep Ahlawat. In May 2024, the official title of the movie was announced Jewel Thief – The Red Sun Chapter. === Filming === Principal photography began in March 2024. The filming took place in Mumbai and Budapest before wrapping up in May 2024. In November 2024, Kookie Gulati was brought in for reshoots. The reshot was completed in December 2024. == Release == In February 2025, Netflix revealed its slate lineup for 2025, and the film was re-titled as Jewel Thief: The Heist Begins. The movie was made available for streaming on Netflix on 25 April 2025. == Reception == Rishabh Suri writing for Hindustan Times gave the movie 1 out of 5 stars. Shubhra Gupta from The Indian Express rated the movie 1/5 stars. Sukanya Verma of Rediff awarded the movie out of 5 stars.
